thread.title: Clarke Kent Plumbing
thread.title_full: ZipRecruiter reviewed by Clarke Kent Plumbing

author: Clarke Kent Plumbing
title: Clarke Kent Plumbing
text: This was my first time using Zip Recruiter. I have used other providers previously and Zip Recruiter was definitely much better. The interface was easy. One thing I liked is how easy it was to browse through applications without having to clicked 5 times per application. I was able to put notes so I couldn't remember why that candidate fit our needs. Liz helped me at the end of the process and was great!
